tool.name: Binary to Categorical Annotation [SPAC] [DMAP]
tool.description: Convert mutually exclusive binary annotation columns to one new categorical annotation column.\ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation for further information.
tool.command: echo '{"dataframe": {"type": "file", "name": "dataframe.csv"}}' > outputs_config.json && python '$__tool_directory__/format_values.py' 'galaxy_params.json' 'cleaned_params.json' --list-values Binary_Annotation_Columns --inject-outputs --outputs-config outputs_config.json && python -c "from spac.templates.binary_to_categorical_annotation_template import run_from_json; run_from_json('cleaned_params.json')"

param.name: Upstream_Dataset
param.label: Upstream Dataset
param.help: Link to prior processed dataset in the analysis.

param.name: value
param.label: Value
param.help: Mutually exclusive binary annotation columns to convert to categorical values.

param.name: New_Annotation_Name
param.label: New Annotation Name
param.help: Name of the column to create with the new annotation.

tool.help: **Binary to Categorical Annotation [SPAC] [DMAP]** Convert mutually exclusive binary annotation columns to one new categorical annotation column.\ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation for further information. **Outputs:** - dataframe: file (dataframe.csv)
